thread.title: BRIEF-BPX SA merges with Business Partners eXcellence; BPX Inc. becomes its parent
thread.title_full: BRIEF-BPX SA merges with Business Partners eXcellence; BPX Inc. becomes its parent | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-BPX SA merges with Business Partners eXcellence; BPX Inc. becomes its parent
text:
Sept 2 BPX SA :
* Merges with Business Partners eXcellence Sp. z o.o.
* Following merger with Business Partners eXcellence and capital increase, BPX Inc. Sp. z o.o. is owner of 90.12 percent stake of company
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
